data.message: Hey, Em. Just to let you know, I stand firmly with Trump. I am also still a fan of yours, because I like your music and don't give two craps about your political stance. Just like you shouldn't give two craps about the political views of your fan base. Don't use your fame to push your political agenda. You want to talk politics out in public? Become a politician. You want to keep making great music and keep all your fans happy? Keep doing that. I'm STILL personally amazed at Rap God, and would love to see anymore work you put out, but, quite frankly it gets annoying when one of your favorite celebrities starts bashing you or your political views. Just my two cents.

replies.message: My profile pic is for u
Well Eminem doesn't want you to like him and doesn't like you...so yeah... Maybe find some new music?
